author: Chong Koh Ping
title: Global Stocks Mixed After Back-to-Back Gains in U.S. - The Wall Street Journal
description: Global Stocks Mixed After Back-to-Back Gains in U.S. The Wall Street Journal US stock futures and Asian markets stumble as massive US stimulus deal moves forward CNN Futures shed gains, with Dow set to drop nearly 300 points at the open CNBC Dow posts first b…
content:
Stock markets in the Asia-Pacific region diverged on Thursday as investors weighed new developments related to the coronavirus pandemic, including the progress of a huge U.S. stimulus package.
